pages.text: Railroad (or railway) crossings protect those on roads from oncoming trains by showing lights and have signs and gates to make it obvious. You can't beat a minecart either, so Thingamajigs adds gates, lights, and other railroad crossing components.

In Thingamajigs 1.7.6+, railroad crossing gates are now dynamic! This is to create parity with another addon for a newer game version of Thingamajigs. If a gate is invisible, either it's broken, or apply a redstone signal pulse to make old gates convert to the new gates. It's that easy!

The gates go up and down with redstone signals, and relay the signal with a custom 'vertical redstone' system to other 'vertical redstone' compatible blocks. The redstone is pseudo so only the bells emit redstone signals (when they have a vertical redstone signal from below) at the top for cantilever usage.
